GFRY Studio 2013-2014 projects.

A platform for proposals.

Yollocalli Teen Space
Artists working in collaboration with community members, to figuratively, literally, and critically reimagine, the spaces around us.

People's Platform
A device that will encourage people to interact with each other in a more meaningful way.

Art/design toolkit for collaborative explorations of public space
An open-ended inquiry to re-imagine the design process through arts and design research workshops, to create community engagements, identify common concerns and experiment with reflective interventions.

10 East Lake Street reinvented
10 East Lake Street Reinvented, begins the conversation about the reinvention of underutilized public space through a sustainability, technology and culture.

Free Sample Architecture
Foster agency and embrace democratic design through welcoming, hands-on access to design processes, available directly to the inhabitants of public spaces.

Stool Project
--missing-.

The Miniature Chicago
The moment of serendipity; harmoniously curated sensory experiences to evoke new emotions.

10 East lake Street - Documentary Film
A film to share real stories and ideas, as visionaries with a keen interest in urban planning.

Inspiring Curiosity
Inspire curiosity, playfulness and unique experiences, giving visitors a more intimate relationship with public spaces.

Feedback Loops
Design is meant to be a translator between language disciplines.

City Screen
Democratic participatory design for public access and education for sustainability and green technology.
